rdf:Description.dc:title: FOIP guidelines and practices 2009 2009
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Service Alberta.
Alberta. Access and Privacy.
rdf:Description.dc:description: "Produced by Access and Privacy, Service Alberta."--T.p. verso.

"The 2009 edition of FOIP Guidelines and Practices incorporates amendments to the FOIP legislation up to June 1, 2009, including the FOIP Amendment Act, 2006 and the new FOIP Regulation (2008). This edition references Commissioner's Orders and Investigation Reports released up to December 31, 2008."--Pref.
Alberta Government Library*Copy 1 downloaded from the Web; supplied cover title.
